feed.title: Plex Photos Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.50
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Scaffold recurring task layout by @chrisvel in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/83 Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.41...v0.50

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.60
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Setup intelligence by @chrisvel in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/84
  • Improved UI
  • A new today page
  • Improved settings
  • A couple of bugs fixed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.52...v0.60

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.63
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Linting cleanup by @antanst in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/99
  • Config fixes by @antanst in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/100

New Contributors

  • @antanst made their first contribution in https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/pull/99

Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.62...v0.63

entry.title: New release for tududi: v0.65
entry.content:
Full Changelog: https://github.com/chrisvel/tududi/compare/v0.64...v0.65

  • New create button and inbox quick capture
  • Keyboard shortcuts
  • Fix an issue with project details page crashing If due date was set up
